content.rendered:
Directed by Puri Jagannadh. A.R. Sreedhar

Written by Puri Jagannadh. A.R. Sreedhar. Kiran Thatavarthi

Cast Ram Pothineni (Shankar). Satyadev Kancharana (Arun). Nabha Natesh (Chandni). Nidhhi Agerwal (Dr. Sarah). Puneet Issar (Chief Minister Kashi Viswanath). Ashish Vidyarthi (Ramamoorthy, Central Minister). Sayaji Shinde (Chandrakanth, CBI Officer). Madhusudhan Rao (Kaaka). Deepak Shetty (Devendra Viswanath). Joy Badlani (Harry). Vasanth Kalyan (Civil Engineer (as Kalyan Vasanth)). Chavan Prasad (Chavan). Getup Srinu (Shankar’s friend). Gangavva (Cameo appearance). Lekha Prajapati (in a festival song in ‘Bonalu’ Song). Puri Jagannadh (Self in the song ‘iSmart Theme’). Avinashvarma (Goon #4 (credit only)). Tanikella Bharani.Brahmanandam. Pavitra Lokesh ((as Pavithra Lokesh)). Aziz Naser. Rao Ramesh. Vikas Sethi (Dharam). Tulasi

Languages Telugu

Producers Puri Jagannadh. Charmme Kaur. Vish

Production Aditya Musi. Puri Connect. Puri Jagannadh Touring Talkie
